      • checkFacade

        protected String checkFacade(RestServiceExceptionFacade exceptionFacade,
                 Throwable error,
                 int statusCode,
                 String message,
                 String uuid,
                 String code)
        Checks that the specified RestServiceExceptionFacade provides the expected results for the given Throwable.
        Parameters:
        exceptionFacade - is the RestServiceExceptionFacade to test.
        error - is the Throwable to convert.
        statusCode - is the expected status code.
        message - is the expected error message from the JSON result.
        uuid - is the expected UUID from the JSON result. May be null.
        code - is the expected error code from the JSON result. May be null.
        Returns:
        the JSON result for potential further asserts.

      • checkFacade

        protected String checkFacade(RestServiceExceptionFacade exceptionFacade,
                 Throwable error,
                 int statusCode,
                 String message,
                 String uuid,
                 String code,
                 String errors)
        Checks that the specified RestServiceExceptionFacade provides the expected results for the given Throwable.
        Parameters:
        exceptionFacade - is the RestServiceExceptionFacade to test.
        error - is the Throwable to convert.
        statusCode - is the expected status code.
        message - is the expected error message from the JSON result.
        uuid - is the expected UUID from the JSON result. May be null.
        code - is the expected error code from the JSON result. May be null.
        errors - is the expected validation errors in a format key-value
        Returns:
        the JSON result for potential further asserts.
